TopicTitle: Screen turning black, able to control rocket but not see anything

Articles.Content:
Hello, I've already posted this once, but I had posted it in the wrong topic and didn't include any of the necessities. For some reason, every now and then when I go to the map, I go back to the main part of the game the screen turns black. It all still works, I can see the mods' overlays, but not the game. I can still hear it, I can pause and continue the game (although not showing the paused menu), and I can go back to the map. If I quit from the map menu and open the save back up, it's fixed for a few seconds, then the same thing happens. There's no timed interval or anything with this, it's just random. I usually have to leave the game then come back in to fix it, but it's a big inconvenience for me. It's getting worse now, and scene changes don't work. I have tried removing Scatterer, EVE and SVE, but doing so only gives ten minutes more at the most. I'm speculating it might be PlanetShine.

Version: 1.4.3 (1.4.4 crashes, nothing mod related, something with the installations.)
OS, Debian Linux, 16.04
